name: Blw Twbe
description:
Position yourself then use Z and X to twist sections of the level, work your way to the end! Move using arrows and space.

Controls

Z/X - Twist pieces if standing roughly left of the platform to rotate.

Arrow Keys - Move

Space - Jump

Attribution

  • Music by Tabletop Audio (Song is The City Above), used under CC BY-NC-ND 4.0.
  • Font is Rainy Hearts.
  • Easing functions by Easings.net
